ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) , NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Enterprise Support")) , NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"NSS Manager")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Zone Administration")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HRS Regional Sales Admin")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HNBF Sales Administration")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"MMS Sales ZSA")), $Profile.Name <>"Bank Channel Manager", $Profile.Name <>"Sales Enablement", $Profile.Name <>"Sales Data Steward", $Profile.Name <> "BeneTrac Operations", $Profile.Name <> "HRS PEO Centric Administration", ISCHANGED( District__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ** This field can only be changed by the System Administrator or Zone Assistants**
